title.en: Prayer to the Omniscient Longchen Rabjam

text.en: The Six Ornaments and Two Supreme Ones beautify this world of ours.
text.en-trans: dzamling dzepé gyen druk chok nyi dang

text.en: In the depth of your compassion, learning and realization, you are their equal,
text.en-trans: tukjé lungtok nyampé tu nga yang

text.en: Yet as a hidden yogi, Longchenpa, you practise in forest retreats,
And perfect saṃsāra and nirvāṇa as dharmakāya—
Drimé Özer—'Stainless Light’—at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: drimé özer zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing so I may realize the natural state, the true nature of mind!1
